entry.title: 3M 5151-18X36 - 5151, 18 in x 36 Yd 5151-18x36 7100006659
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 1301.87

[shortdesc]

5151, 18 IN X 36 YD

  • Formed from a light brown woven glass cloth backing impregnated with PTFE (polytetrafluoroethylene), 3M™ General Purpose PTFE Glass Cloth Tape 5151 provides a slick surface on process machinery
  • This tape offers an extremely low coefficient of friction which, in combination with a pressure-sensitive silicone adhesive, creates a non-stick surface that performs at elevated temperatures.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Glass cloth reinforced backing provides greater tensile strength and resistance to tears and punctures than typical PTFE film backed tapes
  • Silicone adhesive offers high temperature performance and long aging
  • Provides a non-stick, low friction surface on heat sealing and packaging equipment
  • Performs under a wide range of temperatures, including up to 500°F/260°C
  • Very low moisture absorption allows the tape to perform in many humid environments
  • Excellent chemical resistance enables tape to withstand challenging applications
    		•

entry.title: 3M 361-1-1/2X60 - 361 Mcs 1 1/2 x 60 Yd Bulk 361-1-1/2x60 7100040610
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 153.23

[shortdesc]

361 MCS 1 1/2 X 60 YD BULK

  • Constructed with a woven fibreglass backing, 3M™ Glass Cloth Tape 361 features a pressure sensitive silicone adhesive for applications requiring high-temperature resistance, high adhesion and clean removal
  • It is often used for high temperature applications such as sealing ducts and as a back-up strip for submerged arc welding.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Strong abrasion-resistant backing provides strength for bundling, harnessing, and protection applications requiring high tensile strength
  • Silicone adhesive provides good holding power and clean removal across a wide range of temperatures
  • Withstands temperatures from -65°F/-54°C to 450°F/232°C and intermittent temperatures up to 550°F/288°C or higher, depending on the type and duration of the heat source
  • Can be certified to meet FAR 25.853 (a) Appendix F Part I (a) (1) (ii), flame resistant specification.
  • Used for permanent sealing of high temperature ducts or chambers
    		•

3M Dust Control Spray, 06837, 1 gallon (3.8 L)

  • ft
